text:
Join the #UofAAugustana Chester Ronning Centre on April 22 for this webinar on "cultural" & "religious" forms of #vaccine hesitancy. What can the study of religion contribute to our understanding of hesitancy related to the #COVID19 vaccine? 

Register: https://t.co/8gMj6wQlWi https://t.co/SxupHNngZ2
